means: 与…离婚(divorce的过去式和过去分词)
与某人离婚，判某人离婚

sentence.Network_en: She took advantage of him even after they were divorced.
sentence.Network_cn: 甚至在他们离婚后，她还在占他的便宜。

sentence.Network_en: This just shows how divorced from reality she's become.
sentence.Network_cn: 这恰恰说明了她变得多么不切实际。

sentence.Network_en: I am absolutely furious that he divorced me to marry her.
sentence.Network_cn: 他为了娶她而和我离婚，我愤怒至极。

entry.def: Someone who is divorced from their former husband or wife has separated from them and is no longer legally married to them.

example.ex: Princess Margaret is divorced from Lord Snowdon...
example.tran: 玛格丽特公主与斯诺登勋爵离婚了。

example.ex: He is divorced, with a young son.
example.tran: 他离婚了，带着一个年幼的儿子。

entry.tran: 脱离…的;与…完全不一样的
entry.def: If you say that one thing is divorced from another, you mean that the two things are very different and separate from each other.

example.tran: 与政治事实相脱离的投机理论

entry.tran: 不受…影响的;置身世外的
entry.def: If you say that someone is divorced from a situation, you mean that they act as if they are not affected by it in any way.

example.ex: This just shows how divorced from reality she's become.
example.tran: 这恰恰说明了她变得多么不切实际。

means.word_mean: 1. of someone whose marriage has been legally dissolved

auth_sentence.content: Welby's parents divorced when he was very young.
auth_sentence.res_content: Welby's parents divorced when he was very young.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Welby's parents divorced when he was very young.

auth_sentence.content: Ms Rousseff is twice divorced and has one daughter.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ms Rousseff is twice divorced and has one daughter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ms Rousseff is twice divorced and has one daughter.

auth_sentence.content: Can you imagine borrowing that much to get divorced?
auth_sentence.res_content: Can you imagine borrowing that much to get divorced?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Can you imagine borrowing that much to get divorced?

Sentence.sentence: Her friend, Pat, the divorced mother of three, is struggling to make ends meet
Likewise, a married man who smokes more than a pack a day is likely to live as long as a divorced man who doesn't smoke.

sentences.en: The sudden appearance of her divorced husband caused her to run away.
sentences.cn: 她那离了婚的丈夫突然出现,她便跑开了。

sentences.en: Trying to get the divorced couple to agree calls for a great deal of diplomacy.
sentences.cn: 要使这对离婚夫妇达成一致需要处事极为圆通。

sentences.en: She got divorced and rushed head first into another marriage.
sentences.cn: 她离婚后不久又匆忙结婚了。

sentences.en: I’ll tell you in strict confidence that they are going to get divorced.
sentences.cn: 我想悄悄地告诉你他们打算离婚了。

sentences.en: In sports,exercise and play are not divorced.
sentences.cn: 在运动中,练习和比赛是分不开的。

sentences.en: They believed that art should be divorced from politics.
sentences.cn: 他们认为艺术应该和政治分离。

sentences.en: When he was depressed, he felt utterly divorced from reality.
sentences.cn: 他心情沮丧时就感到完全脱离了现实。

sentences.en: His hopes for the future are often divorced from reality.
sentences.cn: 他对未来所寄予的希望往往脱离现实。

sentences.en: If you carry on in that way,you will be more and more divorced from the masses.
sentences.cn: 如果你还是那样下去的话,你就会越来越脱离群众。
